SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Creosote
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: Creosote is a flammable liquid used as a fuel, lubricant or ingredient in industry.

SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Water
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: Water is the only source of steam, so its importance cannot be overestimated. It is also used in production.

SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Steam
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: Water steam sets the mechanisms in motion and energizes the machines.

SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Chlorine
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: A corrosive and dangerous gas, indispensable for the needs of the chemical industry. It is also used for the production of complex alloys.

SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Biofuel
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: Fuel derived from vegetable and natural elements. It has fairly good properties and less pollutes the environment.

SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.label: Chemfuel
SteamRim.LiquidSystem.LiquidDef.description: A product of the chemical industry and an excellent fuel. Pretty dirty fuel.
